@description.name: @description
@description.body: The abstract menu button class is used for all type of menu content for example normal buttons, checkboxes or radiobuttons.

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: shortcut {qx.ui.basic.Label} shows if specified the shortcut

@childControl.name: @childControl
@childControl.body: arrow {qx.ui.basic.Image} shows the arrow to show an additional widget (e.g. popup or submenu)
@childControl.description: shows the arrow to show an additional widget (e.g. popup or submenu)

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The label text of the button

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Whether a sub menu should be shown and which one

@description.name: @description
@description.body: The icon to use

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Indicates whether the label for the command (shortcut) should be visible or not.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: A command called if the {@link #execute} method is called, e.g. on a button tap.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Returns the dimensions of all children

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for tap

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for keypress event

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Event listener for command changes. Updates the text of the shortcut.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Update command string on locale changes

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Listener for visibility property changes of the attached menu

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Set the command of this executable.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Return the current set command of this executable.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Fire the "execute" event on the command.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Handler for the execute event of the command.

@param.name: @param
@param.body: e {qx.event.type.Event} The execute event of the command.
@param.description: The execute event of the command.

@description.name: @description
@description.body: Resets the user value of the property command. The computed value falls back to the next available value e.g. appearance, init or inheritance value depending on the property configuration and value availability. For further details take a look at the property definition: {@link #command}.
